lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors moved into a commanding position in the NBA Finals with a 110-77 romp over the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday, the defending champions easing to victory in front of a delighted home crowd.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Destroy Cavaliers to Open 2-0 NBA Finals Lead
headline.main: Warriors Destroy Cavaliers to Open 2-0 NBA Finals Lead

snippet: The Golden State Warriors moved into a commanding position in the NBA Finals with a 110-77 romp over the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday, the defending champions easing to victory in front of a delighted home crowd....
